Role of the @EU_Commission is to act as a catalyst and complement national efforts. 5 areas of our added value:
1/ ensure implementation of country specific recommendations, including concrete structural reforms of labour markets
2/support Member States in their efforts to implement the Youth Guarantee and by frontloading the Youth Employment Initiative.
Berlin conference on #youthemployment good opportunity to exchange Europe-wide experiences, ideas how to stimulate job creation in practise
